name: Epic Space®
detailed_description:
Epic Space® is an experimental space trading game with combat elements. Pilots join one of two factions in a war over resources. Destroy Outposts, NPCs, Collect Resources, and engage in tense Ship to Ship combat all in One Shared Universe.

Join our Discord for questions and more information.

One Server, Shared by All

There is one persistent sandbox/universe. Deploy Asteroid Bases and salvage ships long abandoned by other players. Everything remains active, even while you're offline. Monthly events bring players back to experience new content.

Purchase Asteroid Claims

There are over 10k Asteroids spread across two different sectors (more coming) for players to choose from. Purchase an Asteroid Claim, setup a base, and raise money to fund the war effort.

First Person or Third Person Flight

Play in one of two ways, third person view or first person cockpit. There is also full HOTAS support for the more advanced pilot. Dozens of ship upgrades, modules, and tweaks available for any ship. Chill out and do some mining, support your faction by completing logistics missions, go out on patrol, or fight the enemy at the front.

A Completely Redesigned Experience

With the help of player feedback, we've completely re-tailored the experience. A New Engine, Better Tutorial, new features such as Voice Acting, and a better Chat Network are just some of the new things implemented.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
